tossupQ:
MATH Multiple Choice Pick any arbitrary point in the interior of a circle 12-inches in diameter 
and cut the circle into 8 slices by cutting at 45º angles through that arbitrary point. If you color 
alternate pieces blue and yellow, then the total area of the blue slices will:  
 
W) equal the area of the yellow slices 
X) be twice the area of the yellow slices 
Y) be one-half the area of the yellow slices 
Z) be one-third the area of the yellow slices
tossupA: W) EQUAL THE AREA OF THE YELLOW SLICES
